text: Allapra is a town in Kunnathunad Taluk of Ernakulam district in the Indian state of Kerala. It is on Perumbavoor-Kolenchery road. It is a junction where road to Thuruthipilly meet Perumbavoor-Kolenchery road. ==Religious places== *Valakkara Devi Temple Allapra *Naklikkattu Kalari Temple *Sree Subramaniya Temple Allapra *Naklikkattu Naga Paradevatha Temple *Cholla kavu Allapra *Muthiramali Devi Temple *St:Jacob Church Allapra ==Hospitals== ==Location== {| style="right; margin:0 0 0 0;" | |} == References == Category:Cities and towns in Ernakulam district
title: Allapra
